    • Constructor Detail

      • DiscoveryServer

        DiscoveryServer(ExceptionListener exceptionListener,
                int localDiscoveryPort,
                int localCommandPort,
                int localDataPort,
                java.lang.String selfName)
        Create a new discovery server. The DiscoveryThread.start() function must be called in order to begin listening. Please call close() after finishing the discovery phase. This *only* answers incoming discovery requests with our device identification.
        Parameters:
        localDiscoveryPort - the local listening port. The only port that must be configured manually, as the remotes must be able to send data here without having had contact first
        localCommandPort - this port will be announced to any potential remote in the discovery phase. The correct parameter can be most easily retrieved by requesting CommandConnection.getLocalPort()
        localDataPort - this port will be announced to any potential remote in the discovery phase. The correct parameter can be most easily retrieved via DataConnection.getLocalPort().
        selfName - how to announce this server to any remotes
        exceptionListener - the listener for exceptions that could not be handled internally

        Parameters:
